# iOS Actions

Composite GitHub Actions for iOS projects.

| Name | Description |
|------|-------------|
| [Export Secrets](export-secrets.md) | Encodes secret values to Base64 and writes them into the specified .xcconfig file in KEY = VALUE format. |
| [Fastlane Test](fastlane-test.md) | Runs Fastlane test |
| [Fastlane Beta](fastlane-beta.md) | Runs Fastlane beta |
| [Fastlane Release](fastlane-release.md) | Runs Fastlane release |
| [KMP Build](kmp-build.md) | Builds iOS app (optionally with KMP framework) and uploads to TestFlight |
